content.rendered:
In 2017, we started Tokeny with the vision to make capital markets more accessible by building the most advanced tokenization platform. In only 4 years, our enterprise-grade tokenization platform has enabled financial institutions, governments, and companies to tokenize a total of 8 billion euro of assets on public blockchains in a compliant manner. We have achieved many milestones since last year:

  • PoC with major French banks: Team up with French banks to explore a digital interbank currency system
  • Blockchain50: Named in the CB Insights Blockchain50
  • Billboard launched: Launched the first no-MTF license required secondary market solution
  • Blockchain layer enhancement: Integrated with the Polygon blockchain network for superfast transactions
  • Added digital euro pair: Bring the digital euro to the c-TREX Platform
  • Gas Tank launched: No more blockchain fees for both issuers and investors
  • ERC-3643: The T-REX Protocol recognized as ERC-3643 by the Ethereum community
  • A lot more exciting news is coming up…

Clearly, we are on the right path and are getting closer to reaching our goals. We would like to take this opportunity to thank all of our customers, partners, and friends who have supported and trusted us — without your support, we wouldn’t be here. A big thank you also goes out to each member of the team, we are proud to have built a talented, passionate and agile team, and together, nothing seems impossible!

To date, we have built a complete compliance infrastructure that covers the entire value chain of tokenization: primary market, secondary market and lifecycle management. We’ve made the public blockchain suitable for financial institutions with a unique onchain compliance approach relying on digital identities.

The market is moving quickly, according to Bloomberg, 70% of institutional investors expect to invest in digital assets in the future. Now that investors and technology are ready, we expect financial institutions to bring assets to the blockchain in massive numbers in the coming year. We are proud and excited to provide the technology shield for players to accelerate the digital transformation of capital markets.

We see a bright future for security tokens and the blockchain ecosystem. And we invite you to join us to become a part of this journey to build the future of finance, one that opens investment opportunities to everyone in a more efficient way.

P.S. This year, we managed to have a hybrid style celebration to combine online and offline activities. As you can see below, we had lots of fun. And we look forward to seeing what the future holds. Cheers!
